docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Python script to zip B&R Automation Studio projects including all updates.

The script will zip the project and all updates in the project. The zip file will be saved in the same folder as the project.

docs.title: Running the script
docs.text: The script can be run in two ways:

docs.title: All in one executable
docs.text:
1. Download the latest release from the releases page
  2. Run the executable

docs.title: Python script
docs.text:
1. Download the source code from the [releases page]
  2. Install the required packages 'pip install -r requirements.txt'
  3. Run the script with python './src/main.py'

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: The script can be configured using the config.ini file. The config has 3 sections:

docs.title: AS
docs.text: The AS section contains the path to the Automation Studio installation. This is used to find the Update folder. Make sure the path in this section matches your Automation Studio installations.

docs.title: GENERAL
docs.text: In the general section you can set the debug level. The debug level can be set to 0 = errors, 1 = info, 2 = debug. The other options in this section are the last settings from the UI.

docs.title: TRANSLATE
docs.text: Some CPUs share the same runtime file. For example, the X20CP3687 and X20CP1687 share the same runtime file. The TRANSLATE section is used to translate the CPU name to the runtime file.

docs.title: Run with Windows Explorer context menu
docs.text: The script can be run as a windows explorer context menu. To add the context menu entry follow these steps:

docs.title: Copy files
docs.text: Copy all files from the release package to a folder on your PC.

docs.title: Add registry entries
docs.text:
Edit the file CreateContextMenu.reg and change the path to the folder where you copied the files. Make sure you change all 3 paths in the file.

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\AutomationStudio.English\Shell\BrPyZip]
@="BrPyZip"
"Icon"="\"C:\\Users\\YourUserName\\Documents\\BrPyZip\\BrPyZip.exe\",0"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\AutomationStudio.English\Shell\BrPyZip\command]
@="\"C:\\Users\\YourUserName\\Documents\\BrPyZip\\BrPyZip.exe\" \"%1\""

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\AutomationStudio.German\Shell\BrPyZip\command]
@="\"C:\\Users\\YourUserName\\Documents\\BrPyZip\\BrPyZip.exe\" \"%1\""

Save the file and then Double click the file to add the registry entries.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Right click on the Automation Studio project file and select BrPyZip. This will bring up the window for additional configuration.

Windows 10 Windows 11 In Windows 10 the option should show up immediately. In Windows 11 you have click on "Show more options" to see the option. -------------------------------- --------------------------------

docs.title: How to install Python
docs.text:
Download and install Python from https://www.python.org/

Start the installation, set checkboxes, customize installation, restart the system to make sure that the path information are in affect.
